data.description: The significant wave height is the average height (trough to crest) of the one-third highest waves. At this specified datetime, the significant wave height is recorded as 2.5 meters. This is a statistically derived value, which is considered to be representative of the wave conditions at that time.

location.latitude: To be provided by the API user
location.longitude: To be provided by the API user
location.description: To offer precise conditions, please provide the coordinates of the precise location on the ocean surface where the wave height is to be reported.
